layout: article

<!-- Code generated by generrordocs.go; DO NOT EDIT. -->

```
InvalidTypeSwitch occurs when .(type) is used on an expression that is
not of interface type.

Example:
 func f(i int) {
 	switch x := i.(type) {}
 }
```
